description:
First though, another anomaly, the vampire house share. I really love this film. It's called What We Do in the Shadows and it's a spoof documentary in the spinal-tap mode, about a group of undead bloodsuckers who share a suburban villa in Wellington, New Zealand. They have all the usual challenges: washing up, spats, house meetings, and there not being enough food in the house, so they have to invite some in. The film has been co-directed by, and also stars, Taika Waititi and Jemaine Clement who, back in the mid 90s, formed a comedy troupe at Wellington's Victoria University with Bret McKenzie and a couple of others. Bret and Jemaine later had success with Flight of the Conchords. And now Jemaine and Taika have returned to their long-planned vampire project. They play two of the housemates, Vladislav and Viago, lads centuries old, sometimes a little melancholy, but not so much when they dress up to go out on the town. Jemaine Clement joins me from our New York studio. Now, Vladislav and Viago, they stalked the streets of Wellington long before this particular film, didn't they? So what was their first outing?

"I thought you meant hundreds of years ago. At first, we made a short film in 2005, as a test for the characters, thinking we were gonna make this film soon, let's try it out and see what it'll be like and we can apply for funding. 'Cause here everything in New Zealand, much movies are government-funded and you have to apply. And usually, you've seen it in a form, but we thought we'd make a little film to show our idea. So yeah, there was a first time we put these characters to film."

title: 吸血鬼生活（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

30秒上火星（30 Seconds To Mars），简称30STM，是一组来自美国加州洛杉矶的摇滚乐队，Jared和Shannon两兄弟在1998年组成了乐队，成员目前共3人。2002年乐队发布首张同名专辑《30 Seconds to Mars》，2005年发布第二张专辑《A Beautiful Lie》，在公告牌的Modern Rock chart（现代摇滚排行榜）上创造了上榜50周的记录，是这个榜单自1988年建立以来停留时间最长的专辑。乐队第三张专辑《This Is War》，全球销量突破500万，之后的309场世界巡演还创下了吉尼斯世界纪录“摇滚乐队史上最长巡演”的纪录。根据2013年5月的统计，30秒上火星乐队的专辑在全球销­售已超过1千万张。

No matter how many breaths that you took you still couldn't breath
No matter how many nights did you lay wide awake to the sound of the poison rain
Where did you go? where did you go? where did you go?

No matter how many lives I live, I will never regret
There's a fire inside, of this heart, in a riot, about to explode into flames
Where is your God? Where is your God? Where is your God? ...

Or alive to torture for my sins?

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Hurricane

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

      

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Yawn
To yawn means to extend an exhalation of air, usually due to drowsiness. Who or what is yawning? Where does the action take place? Why?
This week's topic: They yawned... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) yawning in a lecture hall
2) yawning in a dark meeting room
3) stretching and yawning after standing up from the desk
4) covering one's mouth when yawning
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

Shawn yawned and stretched his back after pressing the button to the elevator. Once again, he had gone to work early. One reason was that he had an early morning meeting. On top of that, he wanted to get some work done before the meeting began. Of course the work involved was not related to the meeting. For an organized person such as himself, he had already prepared for this early meeting way ahead of time. Shawn did not like the feeling of being rushed; he liked the feeling of being in control.
